bugs.title: CVE-2014-9762 CVE-2014-9763 CVE-2014-9764 imlib2: security issues fixed in 1.4.7 [epel-7]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2014-9762 CVE-2014-9763 CVE-2014-9764 imlib2: security issues fixed in 1.4.7 [epel-7]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2014-9762 imlib2: security issues fixed in 1.4.7

long_desc.thetext:
Multiple security issues were addressed in the imlib2-1.4.7 version.


Original bug report:

http://seclists.org/oss-sec/2016/q1/162

CVE assignment:

http://seclists.org/oss-sec/2016/q1/182

Upstream git patches:

CVE-2014-9762, segmentation fault on images without colormap:

https://git.enlightenment.org/legacy/imlib2.git/commit/?h=v1.4.7&id=39641e74a560982fbf93f29bf96b37d27803cb56

CVE-2014-9763, divison-by-zero crash:

https://git.enlightenment.org/legacy/imlib2.git/commit/?h=v1.4.7&id=c21beaf1780cf3ca291735ae7d58a3dde63277a2

CVE-2014-9764, segmentation fault when opening specifically crafted input:

https://git.enlightenment.org/legacy/imlib2.git/commit/?h=v1.4.7&id=1f9b0b32728803a1578e658cd0955df773e34f49

Created imlib2 tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1301615]
Affects: epel-6 [bug 1301616]
Affects: epel-7 [bug 1301617]
There is no ABI incompatibility between 1.4.6 and 1.4.7 so it should be OK to rebase.
imlib2-1.4.7-1.fc23 has been pushed to the Fedora 23 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
imlib2-1.4.7-1.fc22 has been pushed to the Fedora 22 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

in the blocked bugs.

bugs.title: CVE-2016-3994 imlib2: out of bound read in GIF loader [epel-7]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2016-3994 imlib2: out of bound read in GIF loader [epel-7]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2016-3994 imlib2: out of bound read in GIF loader

long_desc.thetext:
A vulnerability was found in a way imlib2 processes GIF files. A specially crafted file could cause the imlib2 to crash, or even expose some of the host memory.

Original bug report (reproducer attached):

https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=785369

Created imlib2 tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1323062]
Affects: epel-6 [bug 1323063]
Affects: epel-7 [bug 1323064]

Created attachment 1142568
Silghtly modified patch from the Debian bug

Upstream fix:

https://git.enlightenment.org/legacy/imlib2.git/commit/?id=37a96801663b7b4cd3fbe56cc0eb8b6a17e766a8

CVE assignment:

http://seclists.org/oss-sec/2016/q2/46
imlib2-1.4.8-1.fc23 has been pushed to the Fedora 23 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
imlib2-1.4.9-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
imlib2-1.4.9-1.fc22 has been pushed to the Fedora 22 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

bugs.title: CVE-2011-5326 imlib2: divide by zero on 2x1 ellipse [epel-7]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2011-5326 imlib2: divide by zero on 2x1 ellipse [epel-7]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2011-5326 imlib2: divide by zero on 2x1 ellipse

long_desc.thetext:
A vulnerability was found in imlib2. Attempting to draw a 2x1 radi ellipse with imlib_image_draw_ellipse() will result in a floating point exception.

Original bug report (reproducer attached):

https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=639414

Created imlib2 tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1323082]
Affects: epel-6 [bug 1323083]
Affects: epel-7 [bug 1323084]

Upstream fix:

https://git.enlightenment.org/legacy/imlib2.git/commit/?id=c94d83ccab15d5ef02f88d42dce38ed3f0892882

CVE assignment:

http://seclists.org/oss-sec/2016/q2/49
imlib2-1.4.8-1.fc23 has been pushed to the Fedora 23 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
imlib2-1.4.9-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
imlib2-1.4.9-1.fc22 has been pushed to the Fedora 22 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

bugs.title: CVE-2016-3993 imlib2: off by one error in MergeUpdate [epel-7]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2016-3993 imlib2: off by one error in MergeUpdate [epel-7]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2016-3993 imlib2: off by one error in MergeUpdate

long_desc.thetext:
A vulnerability was found in imlib2 library. Drawing using coordinates from untrusted source may result in an application crash.

Original bug report:

https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=819818

Created imlib2 tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1323617]
Affects: epel-6 [bug 1323618]
Affects: epel-7 [bug 1323619]

Upstream fix:

https://git.enlightenment.org/legacy/imlib2.git/commit/?id=ce94edca1ccfbe314cb7cd9453433fad404ec7ef

CVE assignment:

http://seclists.org/oss-sec/2016/q2/45
imlib2-1.4.9-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

bugs.title: CVE-2016-4024 imlib2: integer overflow resulting in insufficient heap allocation [epel-7]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2016-4024 imlib2: integer overflow resulting in insufficient heap allocation [epel-7]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2016-4024 imlib2: integer overflow resulting in insufficient heap allocation

long_desc.thetext:
A vulnerability was found in imlib2. A maliciously crafted filed can cause an integer overflow, which will result in insufficient heap allocation.

References:

http://seclists.org/oss-sec/2016/q2/76

Upstream fix:

https://git.enlightenment.org/legacy/imlib2.git/commit/?id=7eba2e4c8ac0e20838947f10f29d0efe1add8227

Created imlib2 tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1327478]
Affects: epel-6 [bug 1327479]
Affects: epel-7 [bug 1327480]
imlib2-1.4.9-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
imlib2-1.4.9-1.fc22 has been pushed to the Fedora 22 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
imlib2-1.4.9-1.fc23 has been pushed to the Fedora 23 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

comments.text: This update has been submitted for testing by carlwgeorge.
This update's test gating status has been changed to 'ignored'.
This update has been pushed to testing.
This update has been submitted for stable by bodhi.
This update has been pushed to stable.

notes:
This update rebases imlib2 from version 1.4.5 to 1.4.9.  This is a compatible update with the same library soname.  It resolves multiple high severity CVEs.

- CVE-2011-5326 
- CVE-2014-9762
- CVE-2014-9763
- CVE-2014-9764
- CVE-2014-9771
- CVE-2016-3993
- CVE-2016-3994 
- CVE-2016-4024
title: imlib2-1.4.9-8.el7
